===================
EEA RabbitMQ Client
===================
`EEA RabbitMq Client`_ is a wrapper for pika used for connecting, sending
and fetching messages from RabbitMQ.


.. contents::


Authors
=======

  EEA_ - European Environment Agency (EU)

.. _EEA: http://www.eea.europa.eu/
.. _`EEA Daviz`: http://eea.github.com/docs/eea.daviz
